item.title: [317-Delta] Adding inv item amt method
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[code=java]int countItem(int itemId) {
int count = 0;

for (int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
if (getInventory()[i] == itemId) {
count += getInventoryN()[i];
}
}
return count;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [317-Delta] Adding inv item amt method
item.dc:creator: @MyNameIsDylan MyNameIsDylan
item.description:
@MyNameIsDylan wrote:

I need an InvItemAmt boolean to put into my process. (ex. InvItemAmt(4152); - would read how many noted whips you have in your inventory.)

Would someone post it please if they have it? Thanks. ;D

Because this doesn’t work. Thoughts?

public void fletchingDel() { if ((HasItemAmount(logId, 1)) > fletchDelAmt) //problem p.fletchDelAmt = playerItemsN[i]; //problem RemoveAllWindows(); } if (fletchDelAmt <= 0 || (HasItemAmount(logId, 1)) <= 0) || !isFletching) { //problem isFletching = false; fletchDelAmt = 0; RemoveAllWindows(); } }
